head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHINELLA, G. ROBERT

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHINELLA, G. ROBERT

block.p: SCHINELLA--G. Robert, age 68, of New York City on June 5th, 2007. Beloved companion of Marian Javits of many years, cousin and friend to many. Friends may call Thursday, June 7th, 2-5pm and 7-9pm at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81st Street. Service Friday, June 8th, 9:30am at Frank E. Campbell.

$(6$)SCHINELLA--G. Robert. Dearest Bob, my long time companion and friend. We shared the excitement of life and shared affection and great regard from children; Joy, Joshua, Carla, and grandchildren Emma, Benjamin, Sonya, Tony, and Jacqueline. We love you and miss you. Adrore You, Marian
